title: Loading Screen
body:
Whenever I try to load into a game, no matter what type of game mode or game type, the loading screen says that everyone is 0% loaded in, and then everyone gradually moves to 3%, then 5%, and whenever everyone is 10% loaded in, my game usually starts, but apparently I was the one that never loaded in, so I usually enter the game at the time the minions just spawned. Is there any way I can fix this? I tried redownloading the game, but that didn't work. This also started to happen to me when I played my first AR-URF game around a week ago.
Thanks in advance.

(EDIT) Here is a photo showing what my loading screen would look like for EVERYBODY loading into the game, and how everyone would be loaded at 0%.
https://i.imgur.com/M4OgRgL.jpg

(EDIT 2) Here is a picture of it happening in a real game.
https://i.imgur.com/gqDFcN8.jpg

replies.body: This one is tough, it could be a network issue or performance.  At this point your network is trying to reach the game server and render files.  There could be a firewall in the way here, double check that and anti-virus settings in case of a block.  Our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) can help auto-configure firewall settings.  Test this in a custom game and let me know if it helps.
